attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To impeach Gordon Brown, the Prime Minister, for premeditatedly and blatantly lying to the British people and Parliament as to the provenance of the new EU Treaty, aka Lisbon Treaty aka EU Constitution.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
